mapper.select: SELECT dev_id FROM manage_sys_develop where dev_name = '${devName}';
mapper.insert: insert into manage_sys_develop (dev_id, dev_itemid, dev_name, dev_subsys_eqp, dev_subsys_eqp_name, dev_subsys_eqp_model, dev_subsys_eqp_num, dev_supplier, dev_primary_platform, dev_advice_authorize, project_list, dev_subsys_source, dev_subsys_com_ref, dev_subsys_quantity, dev_subsys_environment, dev_powername ) values (#{devId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
